thread.title: FIDESSA GROUP PLC - Director/PDMR Shareholding

author: stockhouse.com
title: FIDESSA GROUP PLC - Director/PDMR Shareholding
text:
Fidessa group plc (“the Company”)
Director / PDMR shareholdings
The Company has been notified that on 22 nd September 2015 Chris Aspinwall, a director of the Company, purchased 1,000 ordinary shares in the Company at a price of 1779p each. Following this notification his shareholding is 124,542 ordinary shares in the issued share capital of the Company, constituting 0.33% of the issued share capital.
23 rd September 2015
PR Newswire September 23, 2015 - 3:32 AM EDT Tags: REAL ESTATE REIT - OFFICE SOFTWARE - INFRASTRUCTURE TECHNOLOGY
